project_descr: Justice Programme - Women Access to Justice

outputs.output_descr: Despite the justice reforms that have been achieved in Bangladesh, a myriad of factors still hinder poor women from seeking and obtaining justice when they are subject to crime, abuses or violations of their legal rights. By facilitating context-specific innovations and solutions, this initiation plan will engage with women living in poverty on the issues that matter most to them, so they know their legal rights and have access to effective legal aid and alternative dispute resolution services in order to claim them. document_name: ENHANCEMENT OF Real Time Case Monitoring System
